about.title: Meet
about.subtitle: National reference in nail polish and nail product outsourcing, combining tradition, innovation and commitment to excellence.

history.title: A Story of
history.p1: La Vitta was born in July 1998 with the mission of being a strategic partner for brands seeking to grow in the nail cosmetics sector. Over more than two decades, we have become synonymous with trust, innovation and commitment to quality.
history.p2: We have a modern structure, highly specialized team and state-of-the-art technology in our manufacturing processes. Our experience, combined with constant monitoring of beauty market trends, allows us to develop differentiated products.

dialog.title: The Story of
dialog.subtitle: Over 25 years of dedication to excellence in cosmetics

firstSteps.title: The First Steps (1998)
firstSteps.description: In July 1998, La Vitta Cosmetics was born with a revolutionary vision: to specialize exclusively in outsourcing nail polish manufacturing. From the beginning, our mission was clear - not just to produce, but to be strategic partners for our clients.

growth.title: Growth and Innovation
growth.p1: Over the years, we have constantly invested in research and development, closely monitoring global beauty trends. Our technical team works tirelessly to improve formulas, testing new pigments and developing colors that capture the spirit of each era.
growth.p2: We have developed expertise in different types of finishes: from classic creams to the most modern formulations with glitter, pearlescent and specialized treatments.

expansion.title: National and International Expansion
expansion.description: Our reputation for quality and reliability has taken us beyond national borders. Today, we serve clients in several countries, always maintaining the same rigorous quality standards that have made us a reference in the Brazilian market.

certifications.title: Commitment to Quality
certifications.description: We have all the necessary certifications and authorizations from the competent bodies:

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.p1: We consciously chose not to have our own brand, keeping our total focus on outsourcing. This strategic decision allows us to dedicate 100% of our energy and resources to the success of our partners.
philosophy.p2: Each project is unique, developed in a personalized way to meet the specific needs and market goals of each client. We don't just manufacture nail polishes - we build dreams and help brands stand out in the competitive beauty universe.
